sentences.sentence: Locally, they are called "Mosi-Oa-Tunya," meaning "smoke that thunders."
sentences.translation: 当地人叫他“Mosi - Oa - Tunya”，意思是烟尘雷鸣。

sentences.sentence: When it thunders why do we see the lighting first, then hear the thunder?
sentences.translation: 为什么在打雷时，我们总是先看到闪电后听到雷声？

sentences.sentence: Q: When it thunders why do we see the lighting first, then hear the thunder?
sentences.translation: 问：为什么在打雷时，我们总是先看到闪电后听到雷声？
